item.title: Text Clock
item.description: A few years ago I came across a clock design that I hadn't seen before: I thought the design was pretty cool and I wondered how hard it would be to build a webpage that would display similar wording and “light up” the words to represent the current time. After an hour or so I had something I was happy with: You can see the live version here and the code here.
